channel.title: How Do You Think I Should Evaluate The Screen For Images
channel.description:
I'm basically streaming the entire screen of a computer into an array of 0's and 1's but I'm wondering whether or not I should evaulate whether or not it should be a 0 for dark or 1 for lighter based on the individual pixel's Red, Green or Blue property or all of them combined.
or...
Should I look into HSL for this task.
Any input is appreciated.

item.title: How Do You Think I Should Evaluate The Screen For Images
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

Do you mean what lawl said?
Or do you mean dumping a bitmap to bytes to be read?

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Think I Should Evaluate The Screen For Images
